title: Input
description: Raw snapshot collector for a single hotel website: grabs up to 10 pages (depth<=2), stores HTML, and captures mobile home screenshots (initial/after consent/after scroll) plus layout snapshots.

hotelId.title: Hotel ID
hotelId.description: MongoDB hotels._id as string. Used only for joining outputs with your DB.

domain.title: Domain
domain.description: Hotel website domain without protocol (e.g. example.com). The actor will start from https://<domain>/ unless seedUrls are provided.

seedUrls.title: Seed URLs
seedUrls.description: Optional list of starting URLs. If empty, actor uses https://<domain>/ as the only seed.

maxPages.title: Max pages
maxPages.description: Maximum number of pages to crawl in total (including home). Keep low to control Apify costs.

maxDepth.title: Max depth
maxDepth.description: Maximum link distance from home. Depth 0 is seed/home. Default 2.

collectHtml.title: Collect HTML
collectHtml.description: If true, store raw HTML for each visited page in the dataset output.

mobileViewport.title: Mobile viewport
mobileViewport.description: Viewport size used for mobile rendering and screenshots on the home page.

collectDesktop.title: Collect desktop home screenshot
collectDesktop.description: If true, also capture one desktop (1366x768) top-of-page screenshot for the home page. Default false.

consentClickStrategy.title: Consent click strategy
consentClickStrategy.description: How to handle cookie/consent banners on home before the after-consent screenshot. 'minimal' tries a few common Accept/Close buttons if visible.

timeoutMsPerPage.title: Timeout per page (ms)
timeoutMsPerPage.description: Navigation timeout per page in milliseconds (Playwright).
